ygData.subject: Re: Where is that pet?
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 5/19/99 4:34:07 AM Eastern Daylight Time, ... hehe,  It used to do this... but people got more annoyed becaseu then you had the converse
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/19/99 4:34:07 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
sagis@... writes:

> Why not have those hot-keys that select the nearest npcs point to your pet
> first?

hehe, It used to do this... but people got more annoyed becaseu then you had
the converse problem... and could not select the monster... always your pet.

All of the function keys are used already... so the question is WHAT key
would select your pet?

I would more like to see another health bar somewhere that is your pets
health. And maybe even allow a click on it to select your pet...

Sonoroud
